verses.verse: In that <S%H3117>day<s%> there shall be a <S%H4726>fountain<s%> <S%H6605>opened<s%> to the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H1732>David<s%> and to the <S%H3427>inhabitants<s%> of <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%> for <S%H2403>sin<s%> and for <S%H5079>uncleanness.<s%>

And it shall <S%H1961>come<s%> to pass in that <S%H3117>day,<s%> <S%H5002>said<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts,<s%> that I will <S%H3772>cut<s%> off the <S%H8034>names<s%> of the <S%H6091>idols<s%> out of the <S%H776>land,<s%> and they shall <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H5750>more<s%> be <S%H2142>remembered:<s%> and <S%H1571>also<s%> I will cause the <S%H5030>prophets<s%> and the <S%H2932>unclean<s%> <S%H7307>spirit<s%> to <S%H5674>pass<s%> out of the <S%H776>land.<s%>

And it shall <S%H1961>come<s%> to pass, that <S%H3588>when<s%> <S%H376>any<s%> shall <S%H5750>yet<s%> <S%H5197>prophesy,<s%> then his <S%H2>father<s%> and his <S%H517>mother<s%> that <S%H3205>begat<s%> him shall <S%H559>say<s%> to him, You shall not <S%H2421>live;<s%> for you <S%H1696>speak<s%> <S%H8267>lies<s%> in the <S%H8034>name<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD:<s%> and his <S%H2>father<s%> and his <S%H517>mother<s%> that <S%H3205>begat<s%> him shall <S%H1856>thrust<s%> him through when he <S%H5012>prophesies.<s%>

And it shall <S%H1961>come<s%> to pass in that <S%H3117>day,<s%> that the <S%H5030>prophets<s%> shall be <S%H954>ashamed<s%> <S%H376>every<s%> <S%H376>one<s%> of his <S%H2384>vision,<s%> when he has <S%H5012>prophesied;<s%> <S%H3808>neither<s%> shall they <S%H3847>wear<s%> a <S%H8181>rough<s%> <S%H155>garment<s%> to <S%H3584>deceive:<s%>

But he shall <S%H559>say,<s%> I am <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H5030>prophet,<s%> I am an <S%H5647>farmer;<s%> for <S%H120>man<s%> taught me to <S%H7069>keep<s%> <S%H7069>cattle<s%> from my <S%H5271>youth.<s%>

And one shall <S%H559>say<s%> to him, <S%H4100>What<s%> are <S%H428>these<s%> <S%H4347>wounds<s%> in your <S%H3027>hands?<s%> Then he shall <S%H559>answer,<s%> Those with <S%H834>which<s%> I was <S%H5221>wounded<s%> in the <S%H1004>house<s%> of my <S%H157>friends.<s%>

<S%H5782>Awake,<s%> O <S%H2719>sword,<s%> <S%H5921>against<s%> my <S%H7462>shepherd,<s%> and <S%H5921>against<s%> the <S%H1397>man<s%> that is my <S%H5997>fellow,<s%> <S%H5002>said<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts:<s%> <S%H5221>smite<s%> the <S%H7462>shepherd,<s%> and the <S%H6629>sheep<s%> shall be <S%H6327>scattered:<s%> and I will <S%H7725>turn<s%> my <S%H3027>hand<s%> on the <S%H6819>little<s%> ones.

And it shall <S%H1961>come<s%> to pass, that in <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H776>land,<s%> <S%H5002>said<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H6310>parts<s%> therein shall be <S%H3772>cut<s%> off and <S%H1478>die;<s%> but the <S%H7992>third<s%> shall be <S%H3498>left<s%> therein.

And I will <S%H935>bring<s%> the <S%H7992>third<s%> part through the <S%H784>fire,<s%> and will <S%H6884>refine<s%> them as <S%H3701>silver<s%> is <S%H6884>refined,<s%> and will <S%H974>try<s%> them as <S%H2091>gold<s%> is <S%H974>tried:<s%> they shall <S%H7121>call<s%> on my <S%H8034>name,<s%> and I will <S%H6030>hear<s%> them: I will <S%H559>say,<s%> It is my <S%H5971>people:<s%> and they shall <S%H559>say,<s%> The <S%H3068>LORD<s%> is my <S%H430>God.<s%>
